Note: "M.40/53. and (378). Wt.5853/290. 5/290. 5/18. 10M. D.St." appears on the bottom of the poster. Orientation: Vertical.
Description: Text says to women to sign up for Queen Mary's Army Auxiliary Corps. The Army needs women clerks for the duration of the war. No pictorial content.
Digital Collection: Allied Posters of World War I
